verses.translation: (1) For the accustomed security of the Quraysh[1996] -
(2) Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer[1997] -
(3) Let them worship the Lord of this House,[1998]

verses.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ
verses.translation: (4) Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.
